title: The Bachelorette's Ciarran Stott 'snorts white powder' off a man's bare buttocks
text:
Shocking footage has surfaced of The Bachelorette star Ciarran Stott appearing to snort white powder off another man's bare buttocks.

In a video obtained by New Idea, the 25-year-old former Army rifleman is shown standing over an unidentified man who is lying face down on a kitchen bench.

Ciarran, who is one of the favourites to win Angie Kent's heart on The Bachelorette, then appears to inhale the substance off his friend's bottom.

Bad boy: Shocking footage has surfaced of The Bachelorette star Ciarran Stott (pictured) appearing to snort white powder off another man's bare buttocks

The Englishman then goes back for a second snort as a group of men are heard cheering him on in the background.

Daily Mail Australia has contacted Ciarran Stott and Channel 10 for comment.

Meanwhile, the Manchester-born reality star is no stranger to the spotlight as it was revealed earlier this week he used to be a nightclub performer.

Oops! In a video obtained by New Idea, the 25-year-old is shown standing over an unidentified man who is lying face down on a kitchen bench. Ciarran, who is one of the favourites to win Angie's heart on The Bachelorette, then appears to inhale the substance off his friend's bottom

Colourful past: The Manchester-born reality star is no stranger to the spotlight as it was revealed earlier this week he used to be a nightclub performer. Ciarran is pictured bottom left

In 2016, he would regularly perform on stage in skimpy underwear alongside drag queens at Darwin's leading gay nightclub, Throb.

Ciarran even starred in a midnight Christmas show in December 2016 titled 'Camp Christmas: Freezn', which was inspired by the Disney movie Frozen.

On the event's poster, he posed in tiny white hotpants, angel wings and fluffy boots.

Entertainer: In 2016, he would regularly perform on stage in skimpy underwear alongside drag queens at Darwin's leading gay nightclub, Throb. Pictured left in a poster for a Christmas event

'He's not gay but has always been the centre of attention and loved being up on the stage,' a friend of Ciarran's told Daily Mail Australia on Thursday.

Another insider said he 'only worked at Throb for a few months' but has performed as a dancer at other venues across the Northern Territory.

The Bachelorette continues Wednesday at 7:30pm on Channel 10
description: Shocking footage has surfaced of The Bachelorette star Ciarran Stott appearing to snort white powder off another man's bare buttocks.
authors: David Wu For Daily Mail Australia
